survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Thermostat Adoption Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and barriers related to the adoption of smart thermostats in residential settings.

questions.question_text: Do you currently own a smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to segment respondents quickly. Ensure the 'Unsure' option is available for clarity.
